name: Solanaceae: Another Time
summary: When Sal, a satyr, bumps into someone with his bike, flashes of a past life sparkle before his eyes. Funnily enough, the person he rams into, Battam, is a witch who suddenly exclaims they are reincarnated lovers from over one hundred years ago! Sal leaves in disbelief, but once he starts having prophetic dreams that night, he finds himself wondering more about the mysterious witch. Join Sal as he discovers whether or not Battam is telling the truth!
